name: Temple of Boonil
storyline:
You discover a unique temple in your adventures, and your curiosity encourages you to delve deeper. It is nothing like you've seen before. The symbols at the entrance of the temple signify that it is a relic built by the ancient Saasil civilization, that lived 1500 years ago.

The Saasils believed that there are many gods that brought life and light, creating the world as we see it now. The gods also brought color, which made the living more vivid. Many claim that the gods take the shape of animals and plants, as they are the core of life.

The Saasil civilization lived in prosperity, and built many temples for their gods, believing that it will help future generations thrive and preserve the legacy of the ancestors. The gods have blessed these temples, allowing everyone who enters to experience the wonder of light and color. Only a handful of temples remain to this day.

You are surprised how well this temple survived. You manage to decipher the temple's name as "Boonil", what the Saasils would call color. You enter to explore it and experience what one of the oldest civilizations believed in.
summary: Temple of Boonil is an abstract first person puzzle game with a unique striking retro visual style. Use lights and colors to clear obstacles and explore an ancient temple along with its forgotten history.
